titles.title: Homebuyer Tax Credit Renewal Act of 2010
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend for 1 year the first-time homebuyer tax credit.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/8/2010--Introduced. Homebuyer Tax Credit Renewal Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reinstate the first-time homebuyer tax credit for one year beginning on the enactment date of this Act.
